title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.8 - Transfer, segregation and investment of reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.8 - Transfer, segregation and investment of reserve

State Regulations

At the end of each calendar quarter, the provision for
replacements as per Table II of the schedule of replacement reserve
requirements shall be transferred from the administration fund to the reserve
fund, as directed in section
1647-4.5. It is preferable that
expenditures for replacements be made directly from the reserve fund, but they
may also be made from the administration fund, in which case the administration
fund shall be reimbursed not later than the end of the quarter in which the
expenditure was made. The segregation and investment of the reserve are
discussed in Subpart 1647-5, to which reference should be
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-4.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
